descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/UIQMhXZ.png[/img]
Hello all and welcome to Half and Half ENB! After nearly 2 years I am finally ready to release it! I have worked hard and I hope you enjoy. It is pretty performance heavy depending on your system and specs. We also can't forget those mods you all have. This is pretty much the final version. If an error occurs I will get to it.

[font=Georgia][color=#ff0000][size=5][u]Installation
[/u][/size][/color][/font]1. Download and install Climates of Tamriel V
2. Download and install Enhanced Lights and Effects. (Turn off ELFX Exteriors esp)
3. Download latest enb files from [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]here[/url]
4. Download my ENB and place the files in your main Skyrim directory. (Default is C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\Steamapps\common\Skryim\)
5. Launch Skyrim.

[font=Georgia][color=#ff0000][size=5][u]Compatibility
[/u][/size][/color][/font]This ENB is only compatible with the weather and lighting mods above. Mods that change these two will NOT make the ENB look right. Any other mod is fine.

  [img]https://i.imgur.com/IWBle8b.png[/img]
  [img]https://i.imgur.com/Wfywvyh.png[/img]
  [img]https://i.imgur.com/cxlssyb.png[/img]

Thanks to Boris Vorontsov for making ENB possible.
author: Venom_Shade
